title.label: The game is so unfair I can’t win!!!!!!!!

content.label: I’m all ways getting matched up against better players and I always lose!!!

Hey, (reader)

I have played clash Royale for 8 months now, playing this game, makes me think that something is unfair about it. I have reached silver league now. I have played so many decks, to reach a higher level. The amount of easy wins you get, the higher level bot/player is got in the next round. Therefore, those high level players win easily. This deducts our trophies and crowns. Instead of this matchmaking, I would like you to kindly fix the matchmaking in the next update. Apparently, I am in level 9 and I see level 13 players by this rigged matchmaking. Next update, I would like you to do matchmaking with similar level players and of the SAME SERVER.

Yours sincerely,

xyz
It’s totally a pay to play if you can’t afford to pay don’t play.

title.label: Kinda don’t want to play anymore

content.label: This game when it first came out was very fun and people had to use skill, however now the game is broken I passed from arena 1 to challenger 2 in 2 weeks and after getting to those higher arenas I encountered many people that were 3 levels higher then me making it impossible for me to get to the next arena you need to fix this because for those of us that are trying to get to the next arena and are having to deal with people 3 levels higher making it impossible and very very frustrating I hate to leave this review because I have been playing this game since it came out but it is so frustrating that I can’t pass an arena because people that are higher level are trophies dropping
Best game in a long time enjoy each game I play every time

I used to love this game until I noticed how rigged it is. The game pairs you with fair people at first, but after a while you are matched with players with far more advanced cards and/or 2 or 3 levels higher. I’ve never written a bad review about a game, but the fact that every match I’ve played recently had been unfair just isn’t right. Fix your game. I shouldn’t be going up against someone with way more advanced deck when mine isn’t as upgraded.
El que me ganó que se cague en puta madre
It’s not good at all
This game has major fair play issues. The developers have self esteem issues and this is their way to play bully!!

Mostly putting one star to draw attention to the ridiculous balancing issues with the legendary cards. On their own you can handle them, but paired with other cards they have only one or two cards that counter them. Matchmaking is ridiculous sometimes as well, I am level 9 and get paired with level 5’s and level 13’s often. I feel like this game has so much potential and can be very fun, but things can really add up and make it frustrating.

This game has become borderline unplayable since this card was added from the tournaments there is no defense!!!! You just get your towers crushed or use all your elixir trying to kill it. Ridiculous.
All of the real players have inf elixir and can place as many as they want it's annoying.

This game has been broken since day one and that’s how they want it, apparently, because after all this time they continue to ignore the blaring flaws. Golem, for example, is one of the most over powered cards in the game, and this despite the fact that Supercell is always doing “balance updates” to supposedly keep a card or set of cards from becoming too dominant. That’s a joke. Certain cards are so much better than others and they “fix” the ones that don’t need fixing.. hog rider is another infuriating card.. no skill? Easy fix. Just play level thirteen hog over and over, like at least half of all level thirteeners have been doing for SOO long..

I really love this game. I love how this game has 2v2 and other events and it’s really fun.

My first critique is to update the 2v2 battles. I really love doing 2v2 battles because they are so fun but they become unplayable after a while because eventually you just keep losing over and over again. Also, there have been times when I did 2v2 battles and my opponent out of nowhere spawns FOUR  GOBLIN BARRELS IN A ROW HEADING FOR MY KING TOWER AND CLONES ALL OF THEM for me and my teammate to get destroyed in under a second. There were no breaks either; they just kept spawning over and over again without interruption. Please take these bots out of the game.

My second critique is to update the events. On the events where you have to get 10 wins or 3 losses, I only get 1 or 2 wins before I lose three times in a row.  I tried using every possible deck I could think of and nothing seems to work. This has happened for every event I did and it’s really frustrating.

Other than that, it’s a really fun game.
Trash

title.label: ANOTHER BAD PAY TO WIN GAME

It’s a 100% manipulated game which means it’s not a game. What is it then? A PAY TO WIN GAME. 
Games are supposed to be fun and challenging. What’s fun or challenging about a game that at times lets you win and others doesn’t? 
Yes,this game gives you zero chance of winning after you have won several times in a row. I guess this is to keep you in check. 
F u programmers. Keep this bs game and shove it up where the sun doesn’t shine.

Clans war 2 was just so unforgivably bad. They also did so many grimy things before it and basically lied to the public about the update. It’s not even fixable either because the idea was just so bad in the first place. The worst part is the dev team can’t even revert back to clan wars 1 because then that would mean they haven’t done anything besides add like 3 units in the past like 2 years. The dev team we have now is nothing compared to what they used to be and it’s not like they are lacking funds or anything. I think with my 1 year of coding experience and my Iq above 100 I could easily have made a better update alone. I have no idea how a dev team could think of such bad ideas and then take 2 years to implement them. Not to mention they released e-giant and then messed up his stats so he was unusable for who knows how long. It’s like the dev team has never played the game before, like how would anyone think clan wars 2 would ever be fun. I can’t even express how braindead the dev team has to be for what’s happened to happen.

title.label: It’s ok yet there are way too many things wrong with this game

content.label: I used to be an avid clash Royale player but lately the games quality is just taking a huge drop. The higher arenas are dominated by super high lvls with op cards that supercell never ever nerfs (rg, rh) making it so tilting to climb as a lvl 10 to 11. It surprises me that the higher levels using royal giant and hog cycle can’t get out of masters, or maybe they simply enjoy the free wins. And the community had made it clear that these cards are op, but still they never nerf. In addition, the new clan wars are super boring and don’t feel fun like the old ones did, so drop in quality there too. And most importantly, this game is the biggest lay to win game I’ve ever played, in addition with all of supercells games in general. It tries to downplay how pay to win it is, but ultimately fails. You can lose to someone with no skill just because they spent 20 dollars in the game. Supercell describes this game as “exciting pvp action” but really the game gets so stale after awhile. Even with the new game modes, you still have to deal with the blatantly op cards as before, and it always feels the same. Overall it’s a horrible game and I would not recommend it to anyone, I’m sorry I wasted so many hours of my life on this horrible game.
RUINED

This game is rigged and pay to win. First off I am in the gold arena and have been stuck in it for a very long time. I am a level 9 king tower and I am constantly getting out up against level 12 that’s not fair at all they will always win. 2nd I recently made a deck and went on a 6 win streak, then I come across a e-giant deck and lose. Then I come across 3 more e-giant decks what are those odds SUPERCELL. 3rd I was playing a couple days ago and came across the same counter deck 2x in a row the exact same deck! Again, EXPLAIN those odds. I think that they definitely have an algorithm that puts you up against a opponent with a counterdeck after you win a couple times. This will cause you to keep playing and it makes the game addicting. DON’T get unless your rich!!!!!!
